attributes.action: Parliament must ratify the Paris Climate Agreement before the PM leaves office.
attributes.additional_details:
http://unfccc.int/paris_agreement/items/9444.php

U N Framework Convention on Climate Change
Paris Agreement – Status of Ratification

"Authoritative information on the status of the Paris Agreement, including information on signatories to the Agreement, ratification and entry into force, is provided by the Depositary, through the United Nations Treaty Collection website, and can be accessed here-

https://treaties.un.org/pages/ViewDetails.aspx?src=TREATY&mtdsg_no=XXVII-7-d&chapter=27&lang=en
attributes.background:
Climate change continues.

Immediate measures must be taken to reduce our global carbon footprint.

Ratification of this agreement will demonstrate to the UK people and the world, that this Government understands the severity of the issue, and is serious about inter-generational climate justice.

rejection.details: The relevant date for this action has now passed.
